snippet.title: Augmented Reality for Packaging - Nestle: The Lion King
snippet.description:
At Zappar we create augmented reality experiences that bring the world around us to life.
Our free augmented reality app is available for iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch and most Android phones & tablets.
You can create your own AR experiences using ZapWorks.

Subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=zappartv

Download from App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/zappar/id429885268
Download from Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.zappar.Zappar
Zappar: http://www.zappar.com/
ZapWorks: https://zap.works
